nodes.title: Bugfix after managed to run the unit tests
A couple of changes I made along the way.
Visual block mode (Ctrl-V)
Add PlatformSpecificModeProvider extension point
Improved Paragraph Motion plugin

Ignore comments in XML, and add tests to verify
Fixed problem related to empty-element tags with XML tag text objects
Fix the behaviour of Tag Objects
Make paragraphs and sentences considered jumps
Add support for Vim's _ motion
modified method stubs to make test pass
Reimplemented paragraph text objects
Fixes #177 : use Java 6 (JavaSE-1.6) in all project config files
Implemented Vim's 'cursorline' option

Fix exceptions in SentenceMotion and ParagraphMotion

Added function key mapping support.
Do not share NewLine value between editor's instances
Make StickyColumnUpdater less intrusive. Fix #82.

add a CaretListener that updates the sticky column when using the mouse

Adding unnamed clipboard support
Add support for a few Ex commands
Fix visual cursor paren match proposal
Join without space when next line starts with ')'
Command line mode improvements
Add mapping for indent in visual mode for CDT

Configuration listener, configuration status and general search improvements
New feature: black hole register
Fix for c2w defect
Cleanup logic for moving cursor on yank
Implement wa/wall to save all editors
Fix delete and yank on last line of a file
d/ feature
refactored dW solution to get rid of that ill-advised Util class
Proposed Fix for issue #70: 'dw' on the last word of a line will join lines
Add support for mouse selection in visual mode
Remove reliance on outdated Preferences API; bug 99
Fix bug 98 which wouldn't let me quit eclipse after uninstalling it.
ime-off when esc is pressed
show line numbers and show whitespace
Defaultsystemclipboard
fix for rename refactoring bug
Add support for switch with buffer name with :buffer
Use WeakReference in BufferInfo to allow garbage collection
Vrapper Eclipse keys
Fix #807 - Count not working with camelcasemotion objects
Fix #774 newline replacement
Add 'spell' option
Fix behaviour of '%' when the cursor is at the EOL
contributing bindingkeeper as an optional plugin

Vrapper-sneak Mk. II
Eclipse command plugs

Allow new major versions of CDT
